1. Afspelen (play)
2. MAANDABONNEMENT (monthly subscription)
3. Selecteer (select)
4. turn on VPN
5. Accepteren en voltooien (accept and complete)
6. name
7. e-mail
8. password
9. Verder (continue)
10. card
11. card number
12. Kaarthouder (cardholder)
13. expiration
14. CVV
15. Betaal (pay)
16. OK
